test_cases.description: Tests that main successfully fetches and displays users when UserService returns a non-empty user list.
test_cases.name: Successful user fetch and display

test_setup.given: UserService.fetch_all_users returns a list of user objects, setup_logging and display_users function normally.
test_setup.then: Users are fetched and displayed. No errors are logged.

test_cases.description: Tests that main handles the case when there are no users to fetch.
test_cases.name: Empty user list handling

test_setup.then: An empty user list is displayed without errors.

test_cases.description: Tests error handling when UserService.fetch_all_users raises an exception.
test_cases.name: Exception during user fetch

test_setup.then: Error 'Failed to retrieve users: Database error' is logged. display_users is not called.

test_cases.description: Tests behavior when setup_logging raises an exception.
test_cases.name: Logging setup failure

test_setup.then: Exception is propagated or logged. UserService is not instantiated. No users are fetched.

test_cases.description: Tests error handling when display_users raises an exception after users are fetched.
test_cases.name: Exception during user display

test_setup.given: UserService.fetch_all_users returns a valid user list. display_users raises Exception('Display error').
test_setup.then: Error 'Failed to retrieve users: Display error' is logged.

test_cases.description: Tests that main correctly processes and displays a very large user list.
test_cases.name: Large user list handling

test_setup.given: UserService.fetch_all_users returns a list with 10,000 user objects.
test_setup.then: All users are displayed successfully without errors or performance issues.

test_cases.description: Tests behavior if UserService instantiation raises an exception.
test_cases.name: UserService instantiation failure

test_setup.then: Exception is propagated or logged. No users are fetched or displayed.
